about_the_game:
Sally is a new genre of life-simulation game about community and belonging. Embark on a grand journey aboard a magic flying ship crewed by kids and stewarded by two caring grandmas. Navigate daily life with a diverse array of characters. Craft, cook, farm, build and explore the skies as you become who you want to be amongst the Sally’s found-family.

Build Lasting Relationships

Get to know your unique crew: the characters are different in every game you play! Each of your crewmates has their own life vibrant with emotions, tastes, interests, and even memories. Develop bonds like friendships and rivalries. Learn about everyone’s distinctive personality and aspirations. Watch new connections form aboard the ship, as your crewmates navigate their own relationships.

Craft, Cook, Farm & Build

An array of cozy activities awaits: gather resources on unexplored islands. Cook a comforting meal for your best friend. Take care of animals, build new structures, craft new items, and improve the Sally to feel at home.

Find your Path

Acquire experience points by performing tasks and quests, and use them to unlock new skills. In what ways will you leave your mark in this community? Choose the specific role - or roles - you'd like to enbody amongst the crew.

It will take a village to lead the Sally to its final destination, and to do so, everyone aboard the ship will have to achieve their personal aspiration. Help your crewmates hone their craft and grow together to reach your full potential!

Explore a Rich New World

The sky is filled with floating islands awaiting to be discovered. These eco-systems have different seasons, resources, animals and inhabitants. Journey through ever-changing landscapes and explore to your heart's content. There’s solace to be found in every task, and no time limit. Experience the beauty of Sally’s world at your own pace.

Customize your experience

Select your preferred body type, facial features, skin color, hair color and style, eye color, pronouns, clothes, accessories, and more! Many customization elements are available so you can truly recognize yourself in your character.
